sentences.en: a helicopter was put at their disposal.
sentences.cn: 一架直升飞机供他们支配。

sentences.en: All they had were of course at the disposal of the Rajah.
sentences.cn: 他们所有的一切当然都得听凭王公的支配.

sentences.en: Do you have this information at your disposal?
sentences.cn: 你对这个情况有所了解吗？

sentences.en: Forces at my disposal are totally inadequate to meet attack envisaged.
sentences.cn: 我现有的军队完全不足以应付敌人可能发动的进攻.

sentences.en: He has said he will use all the weapons at his disposal.
sentences.cn: 他放出话说他将使出十八般武艺。

sentences.en: He placed unreservedly all the data he has collected at my disposal.
sentences.cn: 他把他搜集到的全部数据毫无保留地让我使用.

sentences.en: I am at your disposal until Sunday.
sentences.cn: 我在星期日前听你调遣。

sentences.en: If I can be of service, I am at your disposal.
sentences.cn: 如果我可以效劳的话，敬请吩咐。

sentences.en: Its principal purpose is the cleanup of leaking hazardous waste disposal sites.
sentences.cn: 它的主要目的是清理危险性废物处置场地的渗漏.

sentences.en: My initiative doesn't go beyond putting myself at your disposal.
sentences.cn: 我的本意只是来为你效劳.

sentences.en: She waited only for the disposal of her effects at Norland.
sentences.cn: 她只是为了要等待处置她在诺兰德的家财.

sentences.en: Tanner had a lot of cash at his disposal .
sentences.cn: 坦纳手头有很多现金可以动用。

sentences.en: The answer depends on the definition of " disposal " in section 107 ( a ) ( 2 ).
sentences.cn: 答案就在第107条 ( a ) ( 2 ) 对 “ 处置 ” 所下的定义.

sentences.en: The safe disposal of nuclear waste is a major problem.
sentences.cn: 安全处置核废料是个大问题.

sentences.en: They put the summer home at the disposal of the bridal couple.
sentences.cn: 他们叫那对新婚夫妇随意使用那所别墅.

sentences.en: They've stooped to using any and every weapon at their disposal.
sentences.cn: 他们已经无耻到把能用的武器都用上了。

sentences.en: You had better discuss with her the disposal of the furniture.
sentences.cn: 你最好和她讨论一下如何布置家具.

sentences.en: You have all these things at your disposal.

words.tran_cn: 可任意处理的；可自由使用的；用完即可丢弃的
有…倾向的；打算做…的；有某种健康状态的
处置；[心理] 性情；[军] 部署；倾向
处理；配置；使适应（dispose的过去分词）；使有倾向

phrases.tran_cn: 任意使用；任你自由支配；听你差遣
卸泥场；废物处理场；垃圾倾置场
废物处理；废物处理装置

trans.tran_en: when you get rid of something
